where is medicaps university located: Medicaps University is located on AB Road, Pigdamber, Rau, Indore, Madhya Pradesh, India.
how can i get admission: Admissions are generally based on 12th-grade marks. You can apply online through the university's admission portal or visit the campus for offline admission.
what courses are offered: Medicaps University offers B.Tech, M.Tech, BBA, MBA, BCA, MCA, and Pharmacy.
b.tech branches: Common B.Tech branches include Computer Science, Information Technology, Mechanical, Civil, Electrical, and Electronics & Communication.
is there hostel facility: Yes, Medicaps University provides separate hostel facilities for boys and girls with necessary amenities.
contact number: You can contact the university at +91-731-4259500.
admission dates: Admissions typically start in May and continue until seats are filled.
scholarship: Scholarships are available for meritorious and economically weaker students. Please check the Scholarship page for eligibility.
placements: Medicaps University has an active placement cell that coordinates internships and campus recruitments.
hostel fees: Hostel fees vary by room type; typically between INR 60,000 to INR 90,000 per year.
library: The university has a central library with books, journals, and e-resources.
medical facilities: There is an on-campus medical center for students and staff.
